bboxes.reason: Bounding box 3 correctly circles the pressing area of the SPEED button, which is part of the execution area for this control element.

Bounding box 4 encompasses the main executable area of the 'ion_button,' which is the button with the ion symbol. This area is interactive, while bounding box 1 only covers the label, which is invalid.
Bounding box 2 primarily captures the pressing area of the Timer button, which matches the criteria for identifying the control element.

Bounding box 5 captures the execution area of the sleep_button, which includes the symbol of the button (indicating it is interactive). Bounding box 9 only encloses the label text below, which is not the execution area.
Bounding box 6 is the best fit as it encloses the physical button of the 'ON/OFF' power_button, which is the pressing area, while box 7 only covers the label.
